item.title: Paramount Skydance Hires Meta Exec Dane Glasgow as Chief Product Officer
item.description: Paramount Skydance recruited Dane Glasgow, a veteran tech exec most recently at Meta’s Facebook, as chief product officer and the latest member of its revamped C-suite. Glasgow reports directly
